content.rendered: An Three Phase electricity meter, electric meter, electrical meter, or energy meter is a device that measures the amount of electric energy consumed by a residence, a business, or an electrically powered device.The Power meter includes features such as 8 Digit Segment Display with various Voltage,current, Kwh, Power Indicators, Long lasting battery backup with different type of wireless communication method (Bluetooth,GSM,IR-DA).

excerpt.rendered:
• Connection Type: 1 Phase 2 Wire
  • Voltage Rating (P-N): 240V (+20% to -30%)
  • Current Rating: IMAX= 60A
  • Power Factor Range: Zero Lag – Unity – Zero Lead
  • Frequency: 50Hz +5%
  • Starting Current: 0.2% of Ib
